TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {516325=Here's a weird thing: No shave November..., 306022=I give it four stars mostly because of food quality. Food options aren't all that great, but food from the dining halls are relatively cheap and taste good. The most expensive options are in the MU (Togo's, Carl's Jr., Panda Express), but you can also find Bueno's Burritos which gives you a massive burrito for really cheap, plus there's hardly ever a long line, even at 12:30 PM on a weekday., 671018=Its winner of the prestigious 2009 Ivy Award. There are multifaceted food service operation that provides meals and services to the campus community. The campus welcomes all students, faculty and staff to dine in our three dining facilities. We offer menu selections that will meet dietary and budgetary needs of any guest. In addition, residential meal plans also accept Visa and Master Card, OSU Card Cash, checks and cash. The catering department provides all types of services from the simple coffee service to the extravagant wedding event., 851809=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 288935=I have only tried the food once during a tour we did during December, and that was very good!, 226404=Apply for as many scholarships as possible. FAFSA is so important to do January of your senior year. And i'd say just to study hard and do your best on tests in high school.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Chloe from Independence, OR 08/19/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 27 out of 28 people found this review useful. 2 of 194 Categories Comments Great for these types of students When going to a university such as OSU you need to be outgoing and ready to try new things. You also must be able to manage your time because no one else will do this for you. Being a science student I would suggest looking at the school if you are interested in the science or business area. Tips for prospective students The amount you learn in a class depends on many different factors. In the first year you really have to learn how to juggle a whole new array of things that can become quite overwhelming. OSU offers some helpful classes on time juggling, study sessions, and other recourses which should be taken advantage of. Teachers can also play a large role in how much you learn throughout your college experience. Check out www.ratemyprofessors.com for some reviews by people who have
